title: Workshop on Strengthening Advanced Mathematics Teaching Competencies Through Collaborative Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced high school mathematics foundation and instructional design experience
context.additional_context: Team-based project execution and online collaboration tool utilization in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can effectively utilize diverse educational resources (curricular materials, social resources, self-produced documents) during collaborative planning phases.
Learners can distinguish and apply resource usage strategies between mathematical content design and activity design.
Learners can propose alternative instructional design solutions in situations of authority conflicts with team members.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
